title: VoiceHub
description: VoiceHub is a real-time group voice calling platform designed for seamless communication. The app supports multiple users in a single call, providing high-quality audio.

title: i-Notebook
description: i-Notebook is a versatile note-taking application designed to streamline managing your notes and to-dos. The platform supports creating, editing, and organizing notes efficiently, perfect for enhancing productivity.

title: Binary Search Tree Visualizer
description: Binary Search Tree Visualizer is a web app for understanding binary search tree operations through interactive visualizations.

title: Sudoku
description: Sudoku is a web-based game featuring multiple difficulty levels and a user-friendly interface.

title: Airbnb Homepage Clone
description: Airbnb Homepage Clone is a static replica created using HTML and CSS, showcasing front-end development skills and attention to detail.
